General.Name: Hangzhou Robam Appliances Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Robam Appliances Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells kitchen appliances under the ROBAM brand in China and internationally. The company's products include range hoods, domestic stoves, disinfection cabinets, electric ovens, steam stoves, microwave ovens, dish-washing machines, and water purifier. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Guo Fu  Zhang
1.Title: CFO and Head of Accounting Work & Institution
